IsFabricated refers to when the ParserSession expected a node to be valid, but it wasn't.For example, a function invocation on an undefined function will construct a BoundFunctionInvocationNode with IsFabricated set to true.

Property Documentation
ResultTypeClauseNode ResultTypeClauseNodeLuthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.Interfaces.IExpressionNode Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.Interfaces.IExpressionNodeResultTypeClauseNode
TypeClauseNode Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.Interfaces.IExpressionNode.ResultTypeClauseNode[get]
When parsing an expression, there may be a FunctionInvocationNode with a GenericParametersListingNode.
The expression code works however by passing around an 'IExpression expressionPrimary' and an 'IExpression expressionSeconday'.
This means we cannot add common logic for parsing a GenericParametersListingNode unless the expression parsing code were modified, or maybe a call to a separate function to parse GenericParametersListingNode could be done.
But, for now an experiment with making GenericParametersListingNode into a IExpressionNode is being tried out.
Any IExpressionNode that is part of a complete expression, will have the IExpressionNode.ResultTypeClauseNode of Pseudo in order to indicate that the node is part of a expression, but not itself an expression.
Use 'TypeClauseNode IExpressionNode.ResultTypeClauseNode => TypeClauseNodeFacts.Pseudo;' so that some confusion can be avoided since one has to cast it explicitly as an IExpressionNode in order to access the property. (i.e.: GenericParameterEntryNode.TypeClauseNode is not equal to IExpressionNode.ResultTypeClauseNode).
Implemented in Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.AmbiguousIdentifierExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.BadExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.BinaryExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.CommaSeparatedExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.ConstructorInvocationExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.EmptyExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.ExplicitCastNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.FunctionInvocationNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.LambdaExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.LiteralExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.ParenthesizedExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.TupleExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.UnaryExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.VariableAssignmentExpressionNode, Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.VariableReferenceNode, and Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.WithExpressionNode.
